players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I believe we should focus on finding the mafia among us and eliminate them to ensure our victory. Let's be vigilant and pay close attention to each other's actions and words."
Diana: "I agree with Charlie's suggestion to focus on identifying the mafia among us. Let's work together and share any suspicious observations or concerns we may have."
You: "Let's not jump to conclusions, we don't know who the mafia is yet. Let's keep an eye on each other and see what happens next."
